name: Star Legion
description:
Join the fleet in taking the battle to the enemy! Dogfight for supremacy in the stars.

Star Legion is a science fiction action game early in development (alpha). Follow development on IndieDB.

Controls for itch.io Alpha:

ActionControlAccelerate ForwardW / Up Arrow KeyRotate StarfighterA & D / Left & Right Arrow KeysFire WeaponSpace Bar / Left Mouse Button
F / Right Mouse Button

Implemented Features

  • Defeat the enemy forces to win.
  • Defend your space station and destroy the enemy station to win.

Anticipated Features*

  • Earn points to play as more powerful starships, including frigate and battle cruisers.
  • Fight with a variety of weapons, including lasers cannons, homing missiles, and EMP blasts.
  • Play with the keyboard, mouse, or controller.

* Planned features may change while in development.
